segments.text: You spoken English is pretty good . Please tell me your experience in learning English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh , I don't know what to say . What do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me think a minute . I think I always try to take every chance to practice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if there is no chance ? I mean what if you don't have a partner , what will you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I talk to myself . That is , I play one role first , then the other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . You are really creative .
segments.speaker: S1
